Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's relatively safer here, let's stop here for a bit of maintenance.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee had wanted to find an excuse and leave, but after seeing how the injured Construct was carrying his teammate, he changed his mind.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "I'm fine, he's the one who needs attention.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Let's stop here since we can't detect the Corrupted's signal anymore!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee immediately starts inspecting the comatose Construct soldier as he is set down in a safe corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...His injuries aren't serious and the infection level is decreasing. He should be fine, but just to be safe, we'll set out once his M.I.N.D. becomes more stable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "He's fine... Thank god...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Construct lets out a sigh of relief and turns to thank Lee once more.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Thank you so much!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Don't mention it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct relaxes after knowing his friend is safe, his tongue loosens as well.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Never in my wildest dreams did I expect a Gray Raven member to come to our rescue! I thought you guys only went to the most dangerous of battlefields!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why would you have that impression...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Oh, sorry, I didn't mean anything by that. I just thought that elite teams like you guys would receive more important missions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'As for newbies like us, the command central only sends us out to set up devices and patrol bases...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Those are relatively safer missions, nothing bad about that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "It's different, though! I didn't become a Construct to stay safe!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You got modified... willingly?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "That's right! I may not look like it but I come from a family of soldiers. I've always had a weak constitution though... Needed an exoskeleton even for walking.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "My family... They all died bravely in battle with the Corrupted, and I couldn't carry on their legacy... I couldn't even avenge them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'So when I found out that my body has a strong affinity to Tantalum-193... I was really glad.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'I wish to fight alongside the commandant on the frontlines, to become a captain that members look up to, someone who can protect, and not who I am now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "...Someone who couldn't even save his own partner.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Sorry for the rant... Please don't mind me, my mouth just runs when I relax... It's an old habit of mine.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...It's all right, nothing to apologize for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'No one starts out experienced.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee stands to survey his surroundings, his brows furrowed.'}
{3: 'This is the designated coordinates, but he cannot find anything that catches his attention.'}
{3: 'Has he missed out on some important message? Or, the message is meaningless after all?'}
{3: "Something catches the Construct's eyes and he makes his way toward the other side of the street. He then picks up a broken device from a heap of ruined machines."}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "I never thought we'd find this here... It looks useful. I wonder which squad left it here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is that... an electromagnetic observation device?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "Yep, looks like a model used by the Engineering Force. I've seen them use it on missions, but the Task Force usually doesn't use these.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Construct', 3: "If the navigation system malfunctions, this can serve as a backup navigator. My team member was bad with directions in the first place... If we had found this earlier... Maybe we wouldn't have been in danger.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Construct', 3: "...After all, it's not affected by the Punishing Virus. As long as you can calibrate the imaging, it's a good way to find your bearings when the navigation system is down.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "It's just a shame that these aren't really designed to be portable. If it was smaller, we would be able to take it with us as a backup for emergencies.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(For emergencies, huh...)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "(I'll try to modify this when I have time.)", 4: '1'}
